source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_00<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O would call a meeting to discuss measures against the taint.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_00<tab>Raya-O-Senna semble avoir mis au point un plan.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_01<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O informs you that she and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. Go and fetch Eschiva from Fallgourd Float, that they might share the particulars with everyone.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_01<tab>Raya-O-Senna a mis au point un plan d'attaque contre les corruptions et vous demande d'aller chercher Eschiva au Radeau de la Calebasse pour en discuter tous ensemble.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_02<tab>Eschiva is surprised that the Seedseers still wish to see her in spite of her earlier display. Deciding that she may have been too quick to judge them, she agrees to come with you to Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_02<tab>Eschiva est d'accord sur le fait que quelqu'un doit mettre un terme aux agissements d'Alaqa, et a répondu présente à cet appel. Parlez à Raya-O-Senna au camp des Sentes tranquilles.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_03<tab>Much to Eschiva's relief, her words have reached Raya<var 1F /var>O and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn; the two Seedseers have resolved to leave the Twelveswood in order to help you purge the taint. With their heightened sensitivity to aether, they believe they can ascertain the site of Alaqa's experiment. Make your way to the Dravanian forelands, where you last saw Alaqa, and join Eschiva and the Seedseers at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_03<tab>Raya-O-Senna et A-Ruhn-Senna vous ont annoncé leur surprenante décision de sortir de la Sylve pour tenter de neutraliser, avec votre aide, les dernières corruptions. Eschiva va les escorter jusqu'à La Penne, où ils vous ont donné rendez-vous.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_04<tab>Shortly after arriving at Tailfeather, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn senses an anomaly in the aether emanating from the northwest. A cavern called Mourn lies in that direction, along with a water vein, and the party decides to investigate it. Brave the dragon-infested area and search for Alaqa.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_04<tab>A-Ruhn a ressenti une énergie nauséabonde en direction du nord-ouest, près de Morne. Rendez-vous sur place et cherchez des traces du passage d'Alaqa.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_05<tab>Deep within the cavern of Mourn, you find Alaqa just as she completes her experiment─an undead dragon whose existence is sustained by the taint. Upon confronting her, the Au Ra justifies her actions as self-preservation: her tribesmen have suffered much at the hands of the ignorant, and she desires but to protect them. Having said her piece, she unleashes her pet upon you, but you succeed in overcoming it and purifying the taint which gave it life. With her dreams of vengeance thus shattered, all of the fight goes out of Alaqa.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez réussi à vaincre <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F210590202 /var> d'Alaqa, responsable de l'apparition des corruptions. Parlez à Raya-O-Senna, à présent.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_06<tab>Though Alaqa must answer for her crimes, Raya<var 1F /var>O offers her words of hope for the future. Watching on from a distance, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn resolves to do as A<var 1F /var>Towa<var 1F /var>Cant once did and go wheresoever his powers are needed, be it to the ends of the world. With gratitude, he accepts Eschiva's offer to accompany him as he embarks upon his journeys.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_06<tab>Raya-O-Senna vous a expliqué qu'Alaqa va finalement être conduite en prison, et elle lui souhaite de trouver une nouvelle motivation. L'Oracle et son frère seront plus actifs pour combattre les menaces qui pèsent sur la Sylve. Parlez-lui à Morne pour faire le point.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_07<tab>The two Seedseers shall see the misguided Au Ra given over to the Wood Wailers. Afterwards, Raya<var 1F /var>O bids you and Eschiva come to see her and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn at Camp Tranquil, that they might properly thank you for your services to the Twelveswood.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_07<tab>Raya-O-Senna aimerait vous remercier personnellement pour votre aide une fois qu'elle aura emmené Alaqa. Retrouvez-la au camp des Sentes tranquilles.

source:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_08<tab>You bid Eschiva farewell as she departs with A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. Together with her siblings, Raya<var 1F /var>O vows to continue preserving the harmony of the forest, protecting it from threats both within and without. With your newfound powers, go forth and shine the light of succor and solace across all the realm.

※The next white mage quest will be available from Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna once you completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_08<tab>Eschiva vous a remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour tout ce que vous avez fait pour elle. Raya-O-Senna et A-Ruhn-Senna ont quant à eux résolu de parfois s'aventurer hors de la Sylve lorsque la situation l'exige, afin de mieux préserver l'harmonie de la forêt.

* Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête de l'épopée “Aux confins du destin” pour commencer une nouvelle quête de mage blanc auprès de Raya-O-Senna.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Eschiva at Fallgourd Float.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Eschiva au Radeau de la Calebasse

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Raya-O-Senna

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Eschiva at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_02<tab>Retrouver Eschiva à La Penne

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_03<tab>Search for Alaqa in Mourn.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_03<tab>Chercher Alaqa à Morne

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna in Mourn.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Raya-O-Senna

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_05<tab>Parler de nouveau à Raya-O-Senna

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Raya-O-Senna aux Sentes tranquilles

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We have conceived a plan to deal with the taint!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_000<tab>Ah, tu tombes bien<var 1D /var>! Nous avons un plan d'attaque pour neutraliser les corruptions<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_001<tab>We would share the particulars with everyone; might I trouble you to fetch Eschiva?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_001<tab>Tu peux aller chercher Eschiva, que je n'aie pas à répéter deux fois la même chose<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_002<tab>She will have returned to Fallgourd Float, I believe.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_002<tab>Moi, je vais chercher A-Ruhn. On se retrouve ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_003<tab>Pray return here after you have notified her. A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall be waiting.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_003<tab>Eschiva doit être rentrée au Radeau de la Calebasse. Je ne sais pas si elle acceptera de venir...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_004<tab>We have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. Pray fetch Eschiva from Fallgourd Float, that we might share the particulars with everyone.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_004<tab>Eschiva doit être rentrée au Radeau de la Calebasse. Je vais chercher A-Ruhn, on se retrouve ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_010<tab>Oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I must apologize for my earlier display.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, désolée d'être partie sans rien dire l'autre fois.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_011<tab>The Seedseers wish to see me despite the disrespect I showed them? Though their ways baffle me, it cannot be denied that they care for the forest. Perhaps they deserve more credit than I give them.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_011<tab>... Les Padjals me convoquent<var 1D /var>? Moi qui pensais qu'ils ne voudraient plus me revoir...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_012<tab>I will go, of course. Let us strike out at once.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_012<tab>Nous ne pouvons pas laisser Alaqa sévir plus longtemps. Retournons au camp des Sentes tranquilles.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_015<tab>We each of us must do our part to protect the forest.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_015<tab>Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>s.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>Worry not─I shall keep my tongue in check.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>Écoutons ce qu'ils ont à nous dire...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_020<tab>Our thanks for coming. Without further ado, let us begin.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_020<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... et à toi aussi, Eschiva.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_021<tab>After our last meeting, I went to the Guardian Tree and presented the tainted flesh to the great one.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_021<tab>L'esprit doyen de l'Arbre gardien a réagi à ces restes... Les corruptions qui infectent la Sylve proviendraient donc de ce même éther souillé.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_023<tab>His reaction was telling─the befouled aether it bears is identical to the taint which now threatens the Twelveswood. Unless we stop Alaqa, the forest will be reduced to a wasteland of death.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_023<tab>Comme le dit Alaqa elle-même, si l'on ne fait rien pour remédier à cela, les morts-vivants vont nous envahir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> gave me to understand that you have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. What is this plan?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_024<tab>Le temps presse, si je comprends bien. Que souhaitez-vous faire, alors<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>Simply put, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall accompany you to the Dravanian forelands.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>Nous allons nous rendre à Dravania, A-Ruhn et moi. Autrement dit, on va sortir de l'enceinte de la Sylve.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_026<tab>As you are doubtless aware, we Padjals are chosen by the elementals to convey their will. Should that will go unheard or be misinterpreted, harmony would be lost and tragedy inevitably befall.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_026<tab>Si nous Oracles avons pour habitude de rester dans la Sylve, c'est pour être à l'écoute de la voix des esprits en permanence. Nous formons un lien entre les hommes et les esprits, pour maintenir l'harmonie au sein de la forêt.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_027<tab>In order to prevent this, we strive to hone our sensitivity to the elementals far beyond the limits of ordinary men. And this sensitivity allows us to perceive even the slightest fluctuations in the aether.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_027<tab>Nous passons notre temps à nous per<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>ner, à former nos esprits et affiner notre sensibilité pour mieux dialoguer avec ces corps d'éther pur que sont les esprits. C'est ainsi que nous arrivons à percevoir même des mouvements subtils dans l'éther.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_028<tab>With our faculty for sensing aether, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall ascertain the site of Alaqa's experiment. And once we find it, we will join our powers to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s and purge the taint once and for all!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_028<tab>Mais il y a parfois d'autres priorités... Nous devons mettre fin à l'expérience d'Alaqa, quelle qu'elle soit, et la faire juger pour ses crimes. Et purifier les corruptions restantes à nous trois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_029<tab>You would leave the forest? But what of the will of the elementals?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_029<tab>Mais... et les lois de la forêt<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_030<tab>Rest assured we have obtained the Elder Seedseer's permission. Our sister shall see to it that the elementals do not go unheard during our absence.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_030<tab>Kan-E-Senna a approuvé notre initiative. Elle s'occupera de prendre le relais s'il se passait la moindre chose anormale dans la Sylve pendant notre absence.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_031<tab>But above all, your words struck home. We will not leave the two of you to bear the burden alone. We shall do all we can to aid you, as Padjals and white mages both.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_031<tab>Mais vos paroles nous ont touchés, Eschiva. Nous ferons en sorte de ne plus nous reposer sur vous, à l'avenir. Et nous vous aiderons, en tant que Padjals et en tant que mages blancs.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_033<tab>You truly mean to leave the forest and help us?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_033<tab>Alors, vous pensez réellement sortir de la Sylve<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_034<tab>In the heat of the moment, I forgot myself and spoke out of turn. I pray you can forgive me.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_034<tab>Je dois vous présenter mes excuses pour mon impolitesse passée. Je me suis laissé emporter et j'ai parlé sans réfléchir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_035<tab>There is naught to forgive. On the contrary, we are grateful to you for opening our eyes. Now, I trust we can rely upon you to guide the way?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_035<tab>Ce n'est rien, grâce à toi nous avons pris conscience d'une chose importante. Mais c'est la première fois que je vais sortir de la forêt<var 1D /var>! Je ne sais pas trop où aller. Tu voudrais bien nous guider, Eschiva<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_037<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This will be our first time outside the forest, and we will most certainly make fools of ourselves. I would thank you not to enjoy yourself overmuch!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_037<tab>... Ne souriez pas, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Nous n'avons pas l'habitude de voyager.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_038<tab>I shall escort the Seedseers to Tailfeather. Pray meet us there.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_038<tab>Dirigeons-nous vers La Penne, dans ce cas. J'accompagne les Oracles, rendez-vous sur place.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>With our powers combined, there is no taint that we cannot purge. Let us make for the Dravanian forelands at once!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>À nous trois, la purification devrait être efficace, quelle que soit la corruption qui nous attend. En route pour l'Avant-pays dravanien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_042<tab>Pray leave the escorting of the Seedseers to me. I shall see you at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, dirigeons-nous vers La Penne. J'accompagne les Oracles, rendez-vous sur place.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>I-I am doing just fine, thank you for asking! There is nothing to it!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>Ça va aller<var 1D /var>! Mais toi, protège-moi bien, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_044<tab>That everything should be so different...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_044<tab>Tout est différent au dehors de la Sylve...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>So here we are at Tailfeather. Why, the journey here wasn't nearly as daunting as I expected. I daresay we could have made it without Eschiva!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>Nous voilà enfin arrivés dans cette région si éloignée de la forêt<var 1D /var>! Mais le trajet était moins im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nant que je l'imaginais.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_051<tab>Bold words coming from someone who fairly hugged our guide during the entire journey.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_051<tab>... Dit la personne qui est restée collée à Eschiva pendant tout le voyage.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_052<tab>Ahem! S-Seeing as we are here, we ought to get to work! Do you sense anything, Brother?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_052<tab>Ahem<var 1D /var>! Mais dis-moi plutôt, A-Ruhn, tu sens quelque chose, toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_053<tab>I do─an anomaly in the aether that wrenches the stomach... It emanates from the north and west.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_053<tab>Je sens une énergie nauséabonde, comme un éther troublé... Probablement en direction du nord-ouest.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_054<tab>A cavern lies in that direction─Mourn, 'tis called. And if memory serves, so too does a water vein. It seems to me that is where we must go.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_054<tab>Autrement dit, près de la grotte de Morne... C'est vrai qu'il y a de l'eau qui circule sous la terre à cet endroit, d'après mes recherches.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_055<tab>I must warn you all, though, that the area is thick with dragons. We must proceed with caution.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_055<tab>Il y a des dragons dans les environs, nous devrons donc redoubler de prudence.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_056<tab>D-Dragons, you say? Well, I for one would welcome the excitement! The journey thus far has been rather dull for my tastes!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_056<tab>Parfait, je ne demande rien de mieux que de donner une leçon à quelques dragons, justement<var 1D /var>! Et même cette Alaqa, si elle me cherche, elle va me trouver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_057<tab>Dull suits us just fine, Sister. Remember, our priority is to purge the taint.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_057<tab>Ma sœur, avons-nous besoin de chercher des confrontations inutiles<var 1D /var>? Du moment que nous parvenons à faire notre rituel de purification...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_058<tab>As if I would forget! The fate of the Twelveswood is at stake! Let us make haste to Mourn and confront Alaqa!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_058<tab>Mais on va peut-être se faire attaquer les premiers, tu sais<var 1D /var>? Enfin bref, commençons par aller à Morne<var 1D /var>! Ces corruptions zombies ne doivent pas nous envahir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_061<tab>The cavern of Mourn lies to the north and west. The area is home to dragons, so let us proceed with caution.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_061<tab>La grotte de Morne se trouve au nord-ouest... Il y a des dragons dans les environs, nous devrons donc redoubler de prudence.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_070<tab>So, you are still alive.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_070<tab>Vous êtes en vie... Vous auriez dû mourir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_071<tab>Most intriguing─horns such as I have, yet you are not Au Ra... Well, whatever you are, you are no different from the others. You have come to interfere with my experiment. But know this: it is your ignorance that has led us down this path.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_071<tab>Vous deux, vous avez des cornes, comme moi, mais vous n'êtes pas de mon espèce... Vous êtes venus me capturer<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi<var 1D /var>? Pourquoi me rejeter...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_072<tab>We Xaela are nomads who roam and live off the land. My tribe was no different. Yet though we did no harm to those whose lands we traversed, they treated us as vermin. In their ignorance, they feared us, and that fear manifested as spite and violence.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_072<tab>Nous, les Xaela, sommes un peuple errant sans terre... Nous avons voyagé à travers les continents et subi toutes sortes de brimades...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_073<tab>My loved ones and I were cursed at, spat upon, beaten, and worse. It was out of the desire to protect them that I began my research. Such pain we have suffered, I swore that I would visit upon the ignorant masses a hundredfold!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_073<tab>Nous avons toujours souffert... Alors, nous nous sommes instruits. Pour trouver notre place, pour nous protéger, pour résister.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_074<tab>And soon I shall fulfill my goal, for my experiment has finally borne fruit!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_074<tab>Il est beau, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? C'est mon chef-d'œuvre, mon enfant... le fruit de mes expériences.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_075<tab>To be sure, there is still work to be done; such robust flesh cannot be sustained by ordinary aether. Nay, it must needs be fed something far more potent─the taint.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_075<tab>Mais pour habiter le corps robuste d'un dragon... il faut une force de vie puissante... c'est pour cela qu'il doit rester près d'une corruption.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_076<tab>My pet can go only where the taint exists, and so I shall fill the whole world with it!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_076<tab>Si ce monde est envahi par la corruption, alors mon dragon pourra voyager, se déplacer partout... Je pourrai me venger de ceux qui m'ont persécutée...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_077<tab>S-Sister! I sense naught but befouled aether from that dragon!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_077<tab>Ma sœur, je sens une forte énergie corrompue émanant de cette bête<var 1D /var>! C'est elle, l'origine de toutes ces corruptions, j'en suis sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_078<tab>This is without a doubt the source of the taint. We must needs purify it whole!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_078<tab>La corruption imprègne pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment sa chair. Il faut le vaincre et le purifier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_081<tab>You would get in the way of my vengeance? Then you shall be the first to feel my wrath!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_081<tab>Je n'attends pas que vous compreniez... Mais j'accomplirai ma vengeance. Vous allez voir à quel point mon dragon est puissant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_122<tab>We all of us can accomplish far more than we dare imagine.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_122<tab>Moi aussi, je suis capable d'accomplir certaines choses lorsque j'y mets toute mon âme.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_123<tab>With the taint eliminated at the source, the Twelveswood is safe again.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_123<tab>La source des corruptions a été neutralisée. Tout indique que la Sylve devrait être hors de danger, avec ça.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_100_124<tab>No...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_100_124<tab>Non...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_100<tab>My dreams... All gone to dust...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_100<tab>Mon chef-d'œuvre... Il est détruit...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_101<tab>I am powerless─powerless to protect my people, powerless to change anything...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_101<tab>Je n'ai plus rien, à présent... Je vais dépérir dans une cellule, seule, comme une paria.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>We are cowards, all of us. That which we do not understand instills fear within us, and so we lash out. In return, you sought to strike back at those who hurt you.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>Alaqa, nous autres gens de la Sylve sommes méfiants. Nous craignons ce qui nous est inconnu... et réagissons parfois de manière blessante vis-à-vis des étrangers ou de ceux qui sont différents de nous. Toi aussi, tu as eu peur de ceux qui te rejetaient, et tu as cherché à leur faire du mal.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_104<tab>You have done terrible things, and must be held to account for your crimes.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_104<tab>C'est là une faute grave qui doit être punie selon nos lois, mais elle peut être pardonnée avec le temps et sa dette, effacée... de la même manière que la corruption a été purifiée.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_105<tab>But know that it is not too late to make amends. You still have a chance to atone.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_105<tab>Je pense qu'il serait dommage de penser seulement à cela. Tu ne veux pas plutôt réfléchir à une manière de racheter tes crimes<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_106<tab>Your knowledge may yet be used for good. You need but find a new purpose, and I should be glad to help you look for it.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_106<tab>Une fois ta peine purgée, tu pourrais voyager et faire de nouvelles choses. Je te rendrai visite de temps en temps pour t'aider à y réfléchir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_107<tab>With Alaqa apprehended, it seems safe to say that danger to the Twelveswood is past. And we owe it all to the two of you.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_107<tab>Puisque la source de ces corruptions a été neutralisée, le danger qui menaçait la Sylve est dissipé. Et tout cela grâce à vous.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_108<tab>This experience has taught me much and more, not least of all how powerless I was in the face of an external threat.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_108<tab>J'ai réalisé à quel point je pouvais être impuissant face aux menaces venues de l'extérieur de la forêt.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>If I am to protect the forest, I must needs spend less time with my head in the treetops and more with my feet on the ground. To that end, I shall strive to be a Padjal as Master A<var 1F /var>Towa was, standing ready to journey to the ends of the world if needs be.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>Moi aussi, je vais essayer de changer. Comme A-Towa, j'essaierai de m'adapter et de voyager au-dehors quand le besoin s'en fait sentir, par exemple si jamais une nouvelle menace plane sur la Sylve. Les solutions peuvent se trouver à l'extérieur<var 1D /var>; c'est la leçon que j'ai retenue de toute cette aventure.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_110<tab>Were it not for your shining example, I never would have found the courage to come to this decision. I cannot thank you enough.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_110<tab>C'est grâce à Eschiva et vous que j'ai pu prendre cette résolution. Merci encore, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_111<tab>Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. When the time comes for you to embark upon your journey, pray allow me to accompany you.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_111<tab>Maître A-Ruhn, si vous voulez bien... Envisagez de me laisser vous accompagner quand vous déciderez de faire un nouveau voyage.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_112<tab>It isn't safe to travel alone, you know this to be true. Besides, you need someone to keep a record of all your deeds, that they might be passed on to future generations.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_112<tab>Il serait bien trop risqué de partir seul, et puis, il vous faut quelqu'un pour rédiger une chronique de votre périple<var 1D /var>! Sinon, comment les générations futures connaîtront vos accomplissements<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_113<tab>For all my bold words, I am still but a green sapling. Nevertheless, I would serve you faithfully as my grandfather once served Master A<var 1F /var>Towa.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_113<tab>Je manque encore d'expérience, mais je m'en remets à votre bienveillance. Comme mon aïeul qui a accompagné maître A-Towa-Cant, j'aimerais vous aider...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_114<tab>I should be heartened to have your company, Eschiva. I shall endeavor to be a Padjal worthy of your respect.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_114<tab>Merci de nous avoir acceptés. Je ferai en sorte de ne plus jamais décevoir mon peuple.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_115<tab>Thank you, Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn! I swear you'll not be disappointed in me!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_115<tab>Et moi, je ferai de mon mieux pour vous soutenir et vous aider.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_121<tab>A new purpose...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_121<tab>Personne ne voulait me parler, jusqu'à maintenant...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_120<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall escort Alaqa and place her in the Wood Wailers' care. Pray come and see us afterwards at Camp Tranquil─we would thank you properly.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_120<tab>Je vais emmener Alaqa en prison. Quand tu auras un peu de temps, retrouve-nous au camp des Sentes tranquilles, car j'aimerais te remercier de manière plus formelle.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_125<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall escort Alaqa and place her in the Wood Wailers' care. Pray come and see us afterwards at Camp Tranquil─we would thank you properly.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_125<tab>Je vais emmener Alaqa en prison. Quand tu auras un peu de temps, retrouve-nous au camp des Sentes tranquilles, car j'aimerais te remercier de manière plus formelle.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_126<tab>You have given me the courage to make a change. I cannot thank you enough.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_126<tab>Les mots me manquent pour exprimer ma gratitude. Merci de m'avoir insufflé le courage dont j'avais besoin pour accomplir ma destinée d'Oracle et de Padjal.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_127<tab>I shall soon depart with Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. I'm glad for this opportunity to see you again.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_127<tab>Maître A-Ruhn et moi allons discuter de nos projets futurs, mais je voulais avant cela vous revoir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_130<tab>During the entire way back, Alaqa did not so much as favor us with a glance, but neither did she attempt to flee.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_130<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! J'ai remis Alaqa aux autorités compétentes. Elle a baissé les yeux pendant tout le trajet, mais elle n'a pas cherché à s'enfuir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_131<tab>I believe there is hope for her yet. Till such time as she finds a new purpose, I shall visit her cell as often as my duties allow.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_131<tab>J'irai lui rendre visite de temps en temps jusqu'à ce qu'elle trouve un nouveau sens à sa vie, libre de tout esprit de vengeance.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_132<tab>With the source of the taint banished, the great one's warnings have ceased. We may rest easy for a time.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_132<tab>L'esprit doyen s'est calmé, une fois que nous avons arrêté l'afflux d'impureté à la source. Nous devrions être tranquilles quelque temps...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_133<tab>Disaster has been averted thanks to you and Eschiva. We are eternally in your debt.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_133<tab>Tout ça grâce à Eschiva et toi<var 1D /var>! On te doit une fois de plus une fière chandelle<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_134<tab>You are kind for saying so, my lady, but I have done scarcely anything. All your gratitude should be reserved for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_134<tab>Je n'ai quasiment rien fait, c'est <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> qui s'est occupé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la purification<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_135<tab>Allow me to thank you as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Had you not sought me out that day, I may never have found my true calling.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_135<tab>Je me dois moi aussi de vous remercier. Je me sens honteuse pour mon attitude bornée et irrespectueuse... Je dois m'ouvrir au monde, j'ai encore beaucoup à apprendre pour marcher dans les pas de mon aïeul<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_136<tab>Beginning today, I shall accompany Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn as he works to maintain peace and harmony within the Twelveswood.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_136<tab>Je vais accompagner maître A-Ruhn et l'aider à défendre la forêt, à l'avenir. J'espère être digne de grand-père<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_137<tab>I know not where our journeys will take us, but when next we meet, I shall stand before you a stronger woman!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_137<tab>Nous nous reverrons peut-être au cours de nos aventures respectives. J'espère que vous serez fi<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> de mes progrès, ce jour-là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_100_137<tab>We had best be on our way. Fare you well on your own journeys, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I look forward to seeing you again, within the Twelveswood <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> without!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_100_137<tab>Nous nous retirons. J'ai hâte de vous croiser de nouveau, y compris hors de la Sylve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_138<tab>Well, they pretty much exhausted everything I had intended to say...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_138<tab>Zut, ils ont déjà dit tout ce que je voulais dire...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_139<tab>So I shall say but this: I mean to do my part as well. Together with my siblings, I shall work to preserve the harmony of the forest, protecting it from threats both within and without.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_139<tab>Je vais continuer d'œuvrer pour défendre la forêt en collaborant avec mon frère et ma sœur.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_140<tab>As for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the white─with your newfound powers, pray continue employing our art for the betterment of the realm!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_140<tab>Toi, continue tes aventures à travers le monde en utilisant la magie blanche pour faire le bien.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_141<tab>May the light of succor and solace shine wheresoever you may go!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_141<tab>Hé hé, assez de belles paroles<var 1D /var>! Je te remercie encore, et je compte sur toi pour nous soutenir encore à l'avenir.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the white mage quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Heavensward. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Vous venez de parvenir à une étape dans la trame des quêtes de mage blanc. Vous pourrez poursuivre cette histoire si vous remplissez les conditions suivantes.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>Il est nécessaire de terminer la quête de l'épopée “Aux confins du destin” pour poursuivre cette histoire.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next white mage quest will be available from Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Il vous suffira ensuite de vous adresser à Raya-O-Senna, près du camp des Sentes tranquilles, afin de commencer une nouvelle quête pour ce job.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat the zombie dragon!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Terrassez le dragon zombi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Heal the stagnant aether to defeat the zombie dragon!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Apaisez l'éther stagnant et terrassez le dragon zombi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_00<tab>Kill them all, my lovely!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_00<tab>Mon cher <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF210590202 /var>... Débarrasse-nous d'eux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_01<tab>It ends here, Alaqa!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Nous ne vous laisserons plus sévir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_02<tab>You'll not harm so much as another leaf!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Je ne tolère pas les gens qui font du mal à la nature et aux hommes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Vengeance is not the way!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Céder à un désir de vengeance est mal, aussi justifié fût-il.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_20<tab>What? The befouled aether refuses to disperse!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_20<tab>Mais<var 1D /var>!? L'éther ne se disperse pas, alors que nous avons vaincu <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F210590202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_21<tab>What is dead can never die!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_21<tab>Mon dragon est invincible tant que la corruption le protège...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_22<tab>The power of healing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Use it to purify the stagnant aether!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_22<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu dois <var 1A 02 /var>soigner<var 1A 01 /var> <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 07F2105A0202 /var><var 1D /var>! Élimine sa souillure avec ton pouvoir de guérison<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_10<tab>Souls of the damned! Render your essence unto my creation!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_10<tab>Ô créatures sans âme, donnez votre force à mon chef-d'œuvre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_11<tab>This bodes ill! Strike down the undead first!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_11<tab>La présence de ces sans âme ne me dit rien qui vaille. Éliminons-les en priorité<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_32<tab>It...it rises! All that healing, and it still wasn't enough!?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_32<tab>Il est revenu à lui<var 1D /var>? Nous l'avons pourtant purifié au maximum...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_30<tab>It is no use! My pet cannot be slain!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_30<tab>Ça ne servira à rien<var 1D /var>! C'est un mort-vivant...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_36<tab>No! We won't give up!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_36<tab>Même s'il est ressuscité, on en viendra à bout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_31<tab>If it rises again, we have but to strike it down!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_31<tab>Peu importe qu'il soit mort-vivant<var 1D /var>! S'il revient, on le tue encore une fois et c'est tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_34<tab>Matron have mercy... It's coming back!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_34<tab>Ah, <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F210590202 /var> est revenu à la vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_35<tab>We must focus on purifying it!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_35<tab>Il n'y avait pas assez d'énergie curative<var 1D /var>? Essayons quelque chose de plus puissant, cette fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_33<tab>Your feeble powers shan't avail you!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_33<tab>Inutile de vous entêter... Vous n'arriverez pas à le purifier aussi facilement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_37<tab>We mustn't give up! Keep purifying!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_37<tab>Nous devons continuer jusqu'à ce que notre puissance curative surpasse l'énergie <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0AF2105A0202 /var><var 1D /var>! Même si nous devons nous y prendre à plusieurs fois<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_40<tab>Confound it! The befouled aether still remains!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_40<tab>Ce n'est pas assez... L'éther ne se disperse pas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_42<tab>How many times must I tell you? You struggle in vain!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_42<tab>Je vous l'ai dit... Ce que vous faites ne sert à rien, il va continuer de revenir encore et encore.

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_41<tab>Hmph! We'll see about that!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_41<tab>Allez A-Ruhn, on y est presque<var 1D /var>! Il faut à nouveau soigner <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03F2105A0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_54<tab>Hah! 'Twas but a matter of time!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_54<tab>Ça semble marcher<var 1D /var>! Continuons avec plus de puissance curative<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_55<tab>Nooo! You will not get in the way of my vengeance!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_55<tab>Je n'ai pas encore abandonné... J'ai tenu bon jusqu'à présent... Je veux me venger de ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_50<tab>It...it still returns!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_50<tab>Il est revenu...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_51<tab>Ah, but the befouled aether is gone! We nearly have it!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_51<tab>Mais je ne sens plus <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 09F2105A0202 /var>. Nous y sommes presque<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_56<tab>Souls of the damned! Come to our aid!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_56<tab>En avant, mes serviteurs sans âme<var 1D /var>! Protégez-le<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_57<tab>More undead! Stay sharp!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_57<tab>Il y a des sans âme<var 1D /var>! Restons concentrés jusqu'au bout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_52<tab>You know my suffering, yet you insist on standing in my way! Why!?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_52<tab>Pourquoi vous acharnez-vous contre moi<var 1D /var>? Ne me gênez pas... ne gênez pas ma vengeance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_53<tab>Wake up, Alaqa! There is more to this than your own suffering!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_53<tab>Tu t'y es mal prise... Tu as fait des choses graves. Mais tu peux encore tout reprendre à zéro et te racheter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_60<tab>No... I cannot fall now...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_60<tab>Non... je ne dois pas perdre...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_61<tab>I was not...strong enough...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_61<tab>Ah... Mes pouvoirs n'ont pas été à la hauteur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_62<tab>F-Forgive me...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_62<tab>J'aurais dû... vous protéger...

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_124<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_103<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_103<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
